message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product, and I think you'll really like it. I'm willing to sell it to you for...
Hi Alice, thanks for your offer, but $250 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $75 for the product. What do you think?
Bob, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate your interest, I can't go that low. How about we meet in the middle? I'm willing to sell it to you for...
Alice, I understand your position, but $180 is still too high for me. I can go up to $85. Let me know if that works for you.
Bob, I appreciate the offer, but I can't accept $85. I'm trying to get closer to what the product is worth. I am willing to go down to...
Alice, I see you're trying to meet in the middle, but $165 is still beyond what I'm willing to spend. I can stretch my budget to $90. Is that something you can work with?
